title: Bottle, ca. 1686–1701
markings: Marks: On bottom in blue underglaze: "AK /10" (for Adriaen Kocks, owner of De Grieksche A factory 1686-1701) and lightly, in manganese: "V".
description: Tall rectangular body, sloping shoulders, round neck with top and bottom rim; painted in underglaze blue on white, on sides above cloud-band border with chinese figures in landscapes and pavillions, on shoulders and neck with chinoiserie motifs; traces of gilding throughout.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bottle, ca. 1686–1701.
ca. 1686–1701. Tin-glazed earthenware, gilding. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-63.
